授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to develop their reading skills, speed and vocabulary through exposure to a variety of different genres of texts.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:

 1. read academic and other genre texts more confidently and accurately.

 2. use a wider range of vocabulary, particularly academic vocabulary.

 3. express opinions on various readings.

 4. improve reading speeds across various readings.
授業方法: This class will be taught in a classroom, face-to-fact format.

トピック.授業計画1:
The class will focus on reading various text materials, discussing the 
contents, expanding academic vocabulary and engaging in other 
grammar-based activities.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to spend approximately 1 hour a week on homework.

評価.教科書Required texts0: All materials will be supplied by the instructor.
